name: Tetrode A0.2
description:
What is a Tetrode?

Tetrode is my 2D sandbox game about exploring the universe! It's also the name of a vaccum tube used in some electronics! This is the second release of it. (Alpha 0.2x) We've decided to create a new page for it, as this version is drastically different from the other one! Reddit page: boop!

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS: EXTRACT ZIP FILE TO A NEW FOLDER AND RUN TETRODE.EXE

NOW RELEASED! PLEASE REPORT ANY BUGS TO JULIAN.C.DRAKE@GMAIL.COM!
